data.title: funny in my view but important question..help..??
data.meta_description: guys i am a sikh boy tying turban(sardaar)..my question is that i cant tie up the turban whole of the time in my journey as its around 25-32 hours..in my...
data.text:
guys i am a sikh boy tying turban(sardaar)..my question is that i cant tie up the turban whole of the time in my journey as its around 25-32 hours..in my passport i have my photograph with turban..i am going to tie turban while going from amritsar flight..now question is that can i wear a cap or something instead of turban when showing myself after landing toronto in front of IO..means ke main apni passport vali pag vali photo ch vaan te main immigration officer de samne yaani ke apni identification vele othe bina turban ch ja sakda..hope sardaars specialy will reply..

aman khinda said:

guys i am a sikh boy tying turban(sardaar)..my question is that i cant tie up the turban whole of the time in my journey as its around 25-32 hours..in my passport i have my photograph with turban..i am going to tie turban while going from amritsar flight..now question is that can i wear a cap or something instead of turban when showing myself after landing toronto in front of IO..means ke main apni passport vali pag vali photo ch vaan te main immigration officer de samne yaani ke apni identification vele othe bina turban ch ja sakda..hope sardaars specialy will reply..

veer parna ban lavi

Bro, I am not sardar.. But I can suggest you is wear turban from amritsar and in the flight you loosen it up... and at toronto you can fix it.

also, what matters is ..are you really genuine person or not... so don't worry about thing.. and i am sure you will find lots of other sardars in flight who can guide you better.. so do keep communicating with other passengers...it will really help you.

nakulgoenka said:

Bro, I am not sardar.. But I can suggest you is wear turban from amritsar and in the flight you loosen it up... and at toronto you can fix it.

also, what matters is ..are you really genuine person or not... so don't worry about thing.. and i am sure you will find lots of other sardars in flight who can guide you better.. so do keep communicating with other passengers...it will really help you.

will i get time after landing so that i caan tie up my turban or parna..??

vinitmenon said:

u can wear ur turban... i dont know if it get un-comfortable in 30 hrs.. if it gets then u can always un-tie it right???

yes brother turban on head for 30 hours is realyy uncomfortable..

It is up to you what you wish to do, As far as, law is concern, it should not tell you to take it off.Bro I am in Uk, here Sikhes are not supposed to be wearing helmet if they do not want to take it off.

Tie turban... Pagg naal jagg te pehchaan mitraa...

cap shap pana chhado... asli singh bano..., I feel so proud and love it when foreigners greet me with Sat sri akal... its just bcoz of my turban

... my flight was also of 26 hrs... but bina pagg toh i dont even step out of my home te Canada aana te impossible si...

All the best...

aman khinda said:

will i get time after landing so that i caan tie up my turban or parna..??

dude.. every airport as washroom/toilets before you reach to the immigration officer. so just use it to fix the pagg.
